/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
